category.name: Active Workspace
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: GATEWAY_delete_tile_for_cut
preference.preference_description: Defines the list of Tile Template IDs to determine the unpin behavior in the Active Workspace client. When a Tile is unpinned or cut from a Tile Collection, if the Tile references a Tile Template ID listed in this preference, the Tile will be deleted. Otherwise, only the relation between the Tile and Tile Collection is deleted.
